title: What is the song that goes, 'Whoa, oh, oh, oh. Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah. Whoa, oh, oh, oh. Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah.' Please help, it is stuck in my head now. Does anyone know what it is? - Quora

response.answer_text: When i first read this, i thought maybe this would be a kpop song haha. But then I was like wait a minute, this sounds like that sound on TikTok. These lyrics, i believe, are from Pitch Perfect. The song where the older Barden Bellas are singing. The one where it goes ‘I saw a sign…’    Hope this was what you meant! Have a good day!
There is a music identifying app on the app store which allows you to sing it yourself and find the song that way, just look up song finder.
